sections.heading: 5063.1 through 5063.19, including Sections 5063
sections.text: 4a through 5063.4i, of this title shall be known and may be cited as the "Credit Enhancement Reserve Fund Act".Added by Laws 1987, c. 222, ยง 71, operative July 1, 1987. Amended by Laws 1993, c. 275, ยง 38, eff. July 1, 1994; Laws 1994, c. 285, ยง 6, eff.
